document_data.mainbody:
The Great South RoadThe Old Empires (sourcebook) labels this road as the "Great East Road", but the map included with the sourcebook labels it as the "Great South Road," and, since the road does travel north to south, the Great East Road is believed to be an error. was a road that was located in the country of Mulhorand during the midâ€“14 century DR. 
The Great South Road ran north to south through central Mulhorand, originating in the north at the border with Thazalhar, and passing south through the Great Vale and leaving Mulhorand via the southeast border with the Eastern Shaar. Along the way it crossed the River Rauthenflow, the River of Shadows, and the River of Spears.
* Jhalhoran
* Surbroar
* Maerlar
* Ulzel
* Rauthil
